name: Solia Invest - 30 Day Development Plan
desc: Complete 30-day roadmap for building multi-tenant SCI platform with KYC functionality

cards.name: Day 1: Initialize monorepo structure
cards.desc: Set up packages/api and packages/client structure with proper tooling

cards.name: Day 2: Configure MongoDB/Postgres Docker
cards.desc: Set up database containers and connection management

cards.name: Day 3: Install Prisma/Mongoose schemas
cards.desc: Generate User, Tenant, and related schema models

cards.name: Day 4: Implement JWT Auth (login/register)
cards.desc: Create authentication endpoints with JWT tokens

cards.name: Day 5: Create SCI schema models
cards.desc: Define Tenant/Part relationships and SCI resource models

cards.name: Day 7: CRUD routes for Users/Tenants
cards.desc: Complete REST API endpoints with proper validation

cards.name: Day 8: SCI CRUD routes
cards.desc: Complete SCI creation, update, delete endpoints

cards.name: Day 9: KYC routes (submit/status/update)
cards.desc: Implement KYC submission and status management

cards.name: Day 10: Multi-tenant relationships
cards.desc: Implement tenant isolation and data relationships

cards.name: Day 11: Admin middleware & permissions
cards.desc: Implement role-based access control for admin features

cards.name: Day 12: Donation/interaction management
cards.desc: Create donation tracking and interaction workflows

cards.name: Day 13: UI components & forms
cards.desc: Build reusable React components for SCI and KYC forms

cards.name: Day 14: Data seeding & validation
cards.desc: Create development data and test validation rules
